remarks: Lemma for ~ isfin3-2 .  Being a chain, difference sets are disjoint. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 5-Nov-2014.)
statement:
isf32lem.a $e |- ( ph -> F : _om --> ~P G ) $.
isf32lem.b $e |- ( ph -> A. x e. _om ( F ` suc x ) C_ ( F ` x ) ) $.
isf32lem.c $e |- ( ph -> -. |^| ran F e. ran F ) $.
isf32lem4 $p |- ( ( ( ph /\ A =/= B ) /\ ( A e. _om /\ B e. _om ) ) -> ( ( ( F ` A ) \ ( F ` suc A ) ) i^i ( ( F ` B ) \ ( F ` suc B ) ) ) = (/) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d F x $.
$d ph x $.
